title: How to Make a Crinkly Children's Book for Babies

steps.headline: Print out the free design for the Crinkly Book.
steps.description: Print the design as an iron-on.

steps.headline: Put it in reverse on white cotton cloth.
steps.description: Place the design face down on the cloth and iron it on.

steps.headline: Fold the cloth in half, with the printed sides touching each other.
Sew three sides of the cloth (2 long, one short).
Turn the packet inside out, use your fingers to poke out the corners
Cut a cellophane pretzel bag to size, and insert it in the open end
Fold in the edges of the open end, and sew it closed, as close as you can to the edge.
Use a heavy duty needle to sew the two pages together.
Give to baby to play with.

text: Print out the free design for the Crinkly Book. Print the design as an iron-on. Put it in reverse on white cotton cloth. Place the design face down on the cloth and iron it on. Fold the cloth in half, with the printed sides touching each other.  Sew three sides of the cloth (2 long, one short).  Turn the packet inside out, use your fingers to poke out the corners  Cut a cellophane pretzel bag to size, and insert it in the open end  Fold in the edges of the open end, and sew it closed, as close as you can to the edge.  Repeat with second page.  Use a heavy duty needle to sew the two pages together.  Give to baby to play with.
